testCase.name: Integration tests for DOM initialization Modal is shown when data-show-modal is true during DOMContentLoaded

main.js DOMContentLoaded logs successful initialization

main.js Event listeners call correct functions with proper parameters
Modal Functions showModal should set modal display to flex

Modal Functions validateStatus returns true when status is checked
Modal Functions validateStatus shows modal and prevents submission when status is not checked
Modal Functions validateStatus prevents submission when status input does not exist
Modal Functions saveWithStatisInactive sets status to inactive and submits form
Modal Functions saveData hides modal and submits form
